title: Instructional Design Scenarios for Academic English (EAP) and Mathematical Literacy Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Online course for undergraduate mathematics majors focusing on academic English and literacy enhancement, conducted asynchronously via an LMS.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze core mathematical concepts in academic English texts (e.g., papers, reports) with 80% accuracy.
Learners can write research summaries using 3,000 basic vocabulary words and 750 academic vocabulary words, including mathematical terminology.
Learners can understand the structure of academic mathematics presentations and create 10-minute English presentation materials.

resources: LMS platform (video lectures, discussion board, assignment submission system)
Mathematics Academic Papers and Report Samples

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
